sentences.english: Even babies like sugar—and lots of it.
sentences.chinese: 就連是嬰兒也喜歡甜味食，而且還是大量的甜食。

sentences.english: Red bean paste is a sweet, dark red bean paste originating from China.
sentences.chinese: 紅豆沙是一種由紅豆製成的中國甜食。

sentences.english: Some may eat too many sweet things like chocolate or candy.
sentences.chinese: 有些人肯會喫太多的甜食，像巧克力或者是糖果。

sentences.english: Serving desserts brings a sweet life in the new year.
sentences.chinese: 春節期間喫甜食，寓意新年甜甜蜜蜜。

sentences.english: Satisfy your sweet tooth with real fruit instead.
sentences.chinese: 換用真正的水果來滿足你對甜食的喜愛。

sentences.english: What 's on the menu for afters ?
sentences.chinese: 菜單上有什麼餐後甜食？

sentences.english: Johnny had threw a tantrum in the shop because I wouldn't buy him any sweet .
sentences.chinese: 因爲我不買甜食給他，強尼在店裏發了一頓脾氣。

sentences.english: Here the well-known dessert will taste unusually delicate if nibbled together with the special coffee.
sentences.chinese: 這裏聞名的甜食，配上了咖啡別具一種風味。

sentences.english: Little eat sweetmeat and glue sex of very strong food, don't eat between meals.
sentences.chinese: 少喫甜食及粘性很強的食物，不喫零食。

sentences.english: Why do not you give up sweets to lose weight?
sentences.chinese: 你爲什麼不放棄喫甜食來養減少體重呢？

sentences.english: Hear them talk about their sweet-eating habits.
sentences.chinese: 聽聽她們談論各自的甜食嗜好吧。

sentences.english: His face fell into the dessert and he died.
sentences.chinese: 他的臉撲到在甜食上死了。

sentences.english: When I eat only sweet things l feel frustringesteding in my teeth.
sentences.chinese: 當我喫甜食的時間我的牙齒會痛。

sentences.english: I know he has a weakness for sweets.
sentences.chinese: 我知道他看到甜食就沒轍。

sentences.english: Georg: We all like cookies and sweets.
sentences.chinese: 我們四個都喜歡小餅乾和甜食。

sentences.english: Jerry eats candy bars everyday because he has a sweet tooth.
sentences.chinese: 傑瑞天天喫好幾條巧克力棒，因爲他對甜食情有獨鍾。
